pullRequest.body:
I noticed that `BigOperators/Multiset/Basic.lean` transitively imports a lot of files, and it sits on the longest pole. If we move one lemma to another file, we can severely restrict the amount of imports required.

Looks like the extra imports that `shake` didn't notice were due to instances being filled in that we didn't actually need.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: Vierkantor can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
For some reason this was not re-queued when the staging commit containing it was cancelled...

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8073609684/job/22057568657)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8073609684/job/22057568966)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8073609684/job/22057569252)

The lemma [was added](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/commit/a01cf868#diff-ebc9675b853e12be424eeaf5113fda0da4142e290abaf161bc7f2287c2f3df8b) by [Johannes Hölzl](https://github.com/johoelzl) and [Rob Lewis](https://github.com/robertylewis) in 2019, according to [changelog](https://mathlib-changelog.org/v3/theorem/multiset.abs_sum_le_sum_abs).

I think we decided the copyright line doesn't change since this is a derivative work. So:
```suggestion
Copyright (c) 2015 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Johannes Hölzl, Rob Lewis
```
